Name: Beat The Moles
About the game: Beat The Moles is an arcade game where you have to hammer at the moles that hide and sometimes crawl out of their holes. The game is limited in time, so you have to manage to hit a large number of moles in short periods of time to get extra time. As the game progresses, its pace accelerates and you should make an effort not to lose.
